channel.title: Error Loading - Please Report! [Help] - [PI]
channel.description:
Ok, so there must be something wrong with the cache. I've tried uploading it again and replace the link with the other link, but it still doesn't work!
The problems appears when i try to load the client. It works for me, since I've already downloaded the cache. Thanks!

item.title: Error Loading - Please Report! [Help] - [PI]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“knucklescape, post:1, topic:392513”]Ok, so there must be something wrong with the cache. I’ve tried uploading it again and replace the link with the other link, but it still doesn’t work!

The problems appears when i try to load the client. It works for me, since I’ve already downloaded the cache. Thanks![/quote]

You didn’t post what the error says.

If it’s something like

Error loading - retrying in %d

Then it more than likely can’t find the cache. In that case, you should edit the “findcachedir” method in signlink.java

if it says

error loading - retrying in %d

then it means that there’s a CRC mismatch, and you should disable the CRC checking in client.java

Read full topic
